data.description: Parses lines from the EverQuest log file.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I believe the naming of this module follows CPAN convention. As it
    is related to processing the output file of a game (EverQuest), it
    seemed that it should be in the Games::EverQuest name space. And
    since it is for the specific purpose of parsing lines from the log
    file, LogLineParser seemed the most appropriate base name.
